DataElement.preferredName: Patient Hemoptysis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating whether a patient meets the criteria to participate in a clinical trial regarding the presence of hemoptysis prior to administration of study treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Hemoptysis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Coughing up blood from the respiratory tract._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient had hemoptysis of
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had hemoptysis of greater than or equal to 0.5 teaspoon (2.5 mL) of red blood within 3 months before the first dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of hemoptysis within the last month?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of hemoptysis or any significant bleeding within the last month prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had hemoptysis in excess of 2.5 mL within 6 weeks prior to the first dose of study medication?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of hemoptysis within the last month prior to randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had hemoptysis of greater than or equal to 0.5 teaspoon (2.5 mL) of red blood within 3 months before the first dose of study treatment or any other signs indicative of pulmonary hemorrhage within 3 months before the first dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled to the atezolizumab + bevacizumab combination arm, does patient have a history of hemoptysis (greater than 1/2 teaspoon of bright red blood per episode) within 1 month of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have history of or active hemoptysis within 1 month prior to Cycle 1 Day 1?
